body:
Comment 4: 
I built Go on my Celeron, stepping 3, and test passed.

Could it be a microcode issue?  Does FreeBSD load Intel microcode updates on boot as 
GNU/Linux does?

/proc/cpuinfo :

processor	: 0
vendor_id	: GenuineIntel
cpu family	: 15
model		: 1
model name	: Intel(R) Celeron(R) CPU 1.80GHz
stepping	: 3
cpu MHz		: 1795.808
cache size	: 128 KB
fdiv_bug	: no
hlt_bug		: no
f00f_bug	: no
coma_bug	: no
fpu		: yes
fpu_exception	: yes
cpuid level	: 2
wp		: yes
flags		: fpu vme de pse tsc msr pae mce cx8 apic mtrr pge mca cmov pat pse36 
clflush dts acpi mmx fxsr sse sse2 ss ht tm up pebs bts
bogomips	: 3594.38
clflush size	: 64
